page.description: Define arguments. Arguments can be bound to page, session and cookie variables. Argument values are passed into all server-side Xbasic event handlers in the component.

section.description: Clicking the [...] button next to the Arguments property opens the 'Define Arguments' dialog.

Click the 'Insert New Argument' button. The 'New Argument' dialog will open. Give the argument a name, choose a 'Data type', select Argument binding, and click OK to add an argument to the Existing Arguments list.
